condition.ab: Three fragments of light brown papyrus, which are darkly discolored in the middle. The original cutting lines have been preserved at the top of fragments A and B and the bottom and right sides of fragment C. The three fragments form one letter of which the top right corner and the bottom left corner are missing as well as a large part in the middle of the papyrus. Several smaller holes in the papyrus have caused some damage to the fibers.
